ingredients: Spices (paprika, garlic, cumin, salt, lemon juice)
instructions: Cook the pumpkin (the potatoes are optional).
Drain well, mash with a fork, then add a little oil and the spices.
notes: Tirshi is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish dish that highlights the flavors of pumpkin and spices, making it a comforting and flavorful side dish.
